segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman looks while the sink is just overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge and forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the water, but she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated that she isn't paying attention to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she's completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's going to fall and make a big scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be shocked when she finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
